description: Try our easy to follow Choc Chip & Blueberry Pancakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Chocolate,Low fat,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: Choc Chip & Blueberry Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Cadbury dark chocolate baking chips
1 tbs Cadbury milk chocolate baking chips
1 punnet fresh strawberries, cut into slices

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C (160°C fan forced). Line sheet pan with baking paper.
Decant 2 pancake shakes into a large mixing bowl. Add 600ml water and whisk until combined. Pour batter into pan and spread to the edges. Top with fresh berries and chocolate chips.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until set.
Allow to cool in pan. Remove from pan, place onto a serving plate and spoon fresh passionfruit over the top.
